name.ja: <ruby>包焼蒸騎<rt>スチームナイツ</rt></ruby>－<ruby>ＢＵＬＬａｕｎｃｈｅｒ<rt>ブルランチャー</rt></ruby>

text.en: "BULLauncher" is a support machine specializing in bombardment and daytime combat that not only has the constantly refined "Coc-OS" and "BFS Armor", but it also has 3 "Foil-Packer" installed within it under orders of "Madera" after repeated trial and error. By installing a "Beef-Rifle" or other armaments, it can be used as medium and long range support for the "Steam Knights" and their operations. Also, "BULLauncher" can be combined with "WINGear" which specializes in high-speed aerial combat and "BOARms", which specializes in melee and assault combat, to cause the high calorie "Steam Jushin - BW" to descend upon this world.
text.ja: 「ＢＵＬＬａｕｎｃｈｅｒ」は、「Ｃｏｃ－ＯＳ」及び「ＢＦＳ装甲」が日々改良される中、「マデラ」の命を受けて試行錯誤の末に開発された３機の「Ｆｏｉｌ－Ｐａｃｋｅｒ」の内、砲撃＆白昼戦闘に特化した支援機である。「Ｂｅｅｆ－Ｒｉｆｌｅ」等の武装に換装する事で「包焼蒸騎」は中・遠距離への対応が可能となる。また「ＢＵＬＬａｕｎｃｈｅｒ」は、高速＆空中戦闘に特化した「ＷＩＮＧｅａｒ」及び、近接＆強襲戦闘に特化した「ＢＯＡＲｍｓ」と“熟成合体”する事で、熱量の高い「包焼獣神－ＢＷ」が降臨する。

ja.set_name: Coco's x Yu-Gi-Oh! Card Game Anniversary Campaign 2024 Part 2
